Question
========

In which of the four forms of functions can every function be written? 

Answerlist
----------

* prefix
* infix
* replacement
* special

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct.
* No, some functions are infix, but not all.
* No, not all functions are replacement.
* No, not all functions are special.
